title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
description: Disney's first animated feature follows a beautiful princess who befriends seven dwarfs while hiding from her evil stepmother.

title: Pinocchio
song: When You Wish Upon a Star
description: A wooden puppet dreams of becoming a real boy and learns valuable lessons about honesty and bravery.

title: Fantasia
description: A groundbreaking collection of animated segments set to classical music, featuring Mickey Mouse as the Sorcerer's Apprentice.

title: Dumbo
description: A young elephant with oversized ears discovers his unique gift of flight and becomes a circus star.

title: Bambi
description: A young deer grows up in the forest, learning about life, love, and loss from his woodland friends.

title: Cinderella
song: A Dream Is a Wish Your Heart Makes
description: With help from her Fairy Godmother, a mistreated girl attends the royal ball and captures the prince's heart.

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: A curious girl falls down a rabbit hole into a whimsical world of peculiar characters and nonsensical adventures.

title: Peter Pan
description: The boy who never grows up takes the Darling children to Neverland for magical adventures with pirates and fairies.

title: Lady and the Tramp
description: A pampered cocker spaniel and a streetwise mutt embark on an unexpected romantic adventure.

title: Sleeping Beauty
description: A princess cursed by an evil fairy falls into a deep sleep, awaiting true love's kiss.

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: Two dalmatians race to rescue their puppies from the villainous Cruella De Vil who wants to make them into a fur coat.

title: The Sword in the Stone
description: Young Arthur is mentored by the wizard Merlin and learns he is destined to become King of England.

title: The Jungle Book
description: A young boy raised by wolves in the jungle befriends a carefree bear and learns to embrace life's simple pleasures.

title: The Aristocats
song: Everybody Wants to Be a Cat
description: A family of aristocratic cats teams up with an alley cat to return home after being kidnapped.

title: Robin Hood
description: The legendary outlaw, portrayed as a fox, steals from the rich to give to the poor in medieval England.

title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
description: The lovable bear and his friends share heartwarming adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood.

title: The Rescuers
description: Two brave mice embark on a daring mission to rescue a kidnapped orphan girl from the treacherous swamps.

title: The Fox and the Hound
description: A fox and a hound become unlikely friends, but society's expectations threaten their bond.

title: The Black Cauldron
description: A young pig keeper and his companions seek to destroy a magical cauldron before an evil king can use it.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
description: A brilliant mouse detective investigates the kidnapping of a toymaker in Victorian London.

title: Oliver & Company
description: A homeless kitten joins a gang of street dogs in modern-day New York City in this Oliver Twist adaptation.

title: The Little Mermaid
description: A mermaid princess dreams of life on land and makes a dangerous deal with a sea witch to become human.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
description: The mouse rescue team travels to the Australian Outback to save a boy and a rare golden eagle.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A brilliant young woman becomes prisoner to a cursed prince and discovers the beauty within.

title: Aladdin
description: A street urchin discovers a magic lamp and uses the genie's wishes to win the heart of a princess.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after his father's death and must return to reclaim his rightful throne.

title: Pocahontas
description: A Native American woman builds a bridge between two worlds while teaching respect for nature.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: A deformed bell-ringer ventures from his tower sanctuary to help a gypsy girl and stand up to injustice.

title: Hercules
description: The son of Zeus must prove himself a true hero to reclaim his place among the gods on Mount Olympus.

title: Mulan
description: A young woman disguises herself as a man to take her father's place in the Chinese army.

title: Tarzan
description: A man raised by gorillas in the jungle must choose between his animal family and human explorers.

title: Fantasia 2000
description: A modern continuation of the original Fantasia with new animated sequences set to classical music.

title: Dinosaur
description: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins a herd on a treacherous journey to a safe nesting ground.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
description: A selfish emperor is transformed into a llama and must regain his throne with help from a kind peasant.

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
description: A young linguist joins an expedition to find the lost underwater kingdom of Atlantis.

title: Lilo & Stitch
description: A lonely Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who's actually a destructive alien experiment.

title: Treasure Planet
description: A rebellious teen embarks on a space voyage to find the legendary Treasure Planet.

title: Brother Bear
description: A young hunter transformed into a bear learns to see the world from a new perspective.

title: Home on the Range
description: Three dairy cows team up to capture an outlaw and save their farm from foreclosure.

title: Chicken Little
description: A young chicken who caused panic tries to redeem himself when aliens actually do invade.

title: Meet the Robinsons
description: A young inventor travels to the future and discovers the importance of family and moving forward.

title: Bolt
description: A TV star dog believes his powers are real and embarks on a cross-country journey to save his owner.

title: The Princess and the Frog
description: A hardworking waitress in 1920s New Orleans kisses a frog prince and becomes a frog herself.

title: Tangled
description: A long-haired princess trapped in a tower discovers the outside world with the help of a charming thief.

title: Winnie the Pooh
song: A Very Important Thing to Do
description: Pooh and friends search for Eeyore's lost tail and try to save Christopher Robin from an imaginary creature.

title: Wreck-It Ralph
song: When Can I See You Again
description: A video game villain dreams of becoming a hero and accidentally unleashes chaos across the arcade.

title: Frozen
description: A fearless princess sets off to find her sister whose icy powers have trapped their kingdom in eternal winter.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A robotics prodigy and his inflatable robot join forces with friends to form a high-tech superhero team.

title: Zootopia
description: A rookie bunny cop teams up with a con artist fox to uncover a conspiracy in the animal metropolis.

title: Moana
description: A spirited Polynesian teen sails across the ocean to save her island with help from the demigod Maui.

title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
description: Ralph and Vanellope venture into the internet to find a replacement part and save her game.

title: Frozen II
description: Elsa journeys into an enchanted forest to discover the origins of her powers and save her kingdom.

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
description: A lone warrior seeks the last dragon to restore peace and unite her fractured kingdom.

title: Encanto
description: The only ordinary member of a magical family tries to save the fading magic and her family's home.

title: Strange World
description: A legendary family of explorers navigates an uncharted and treacherous land alongside a motley crew.

title: Wish
description: A young woman makes a wish so powerful that it's answered by a cosmic forceâ€”a little ball of boundless energy.

title: Mary Poppins
description: A magical nanny arrives to care for two children and transforms their family with wonder and imagination.

title: The Love Bug
description: A down-on-his-luck race car driver discovers his Volkswagen Beetle has a mind of its own.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
description: An apprentice witch uses magic to help defend England during World War II.

title: Pete's Dragon
description: An orphan boy and his invisible dragon friend seek a new home away from his abusive guardians.

title: The Black Hole
description: A research vessel discovers a lost spaceship near a black hole with a mad scientist aboard.

title: Tron
description: A computer programmer is digitized into a computer world where he must fight for survival.

title: The Rocketeer
description: A stunt pilot discovers a jetpack that transforms him into a high-flying hero in 1930s Hollywood.

title: Newsies
description: New York newsboys go on strike against newspaper publishers in this inspiring musical.

title: The Mighty Ducks
description: A hotshot lawyer is sentenced to coach a youth hockey team and learns valuable lessons about teamwork.

title: Hocus Pocus
song: I Put a Spell on You
description: Three witch sisters are resurrected on Halloween night and wreak havoc on Salem, Massachusetts.

title: Cool Runnings
description: Four Jamaican sprinters form the island's first bobsled team to compete in the Winter Olympics.

title: The Santa Clause
description: A divorced dad inadvertently becomes Santa Claus and must learn to embrace his new magical role.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Identical twins separated at birth meet at summer camp and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

title: Holes
description: A boy wrongly sent to a desert detention camp uncovers the truth behind the warden's search for buried treasure.

title: Freaky Friday
description: A mother and daughter magically switch bodies and gain a new understanding of each other's lives.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: A blacksmith teams up with an eccentric pirate to rescue the governor's daughter from cursed pirates.

title: National Treasure
description: A historian must steal the Declaration of Independence to protect a hidden treasure from falling into wrong hands.

title: Enchanted
description: An animated princess is banished to modern-day New York City where she finds true love in unexpected places.

title: High School Musical
description: A basketball star and a brainy girl break social barriers when they audition for their school musical.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
description: Jack Sparrow races to settle his debt with the ghostly Davy Jones or be doomed to eternal servitude.

title: Tron: Legacy
description: A young man enters a digital world to find his missing father and encounters a corrupt virtual reality.

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: A 19-year-old Alice returns to Wonderland to fulfill her destiny and defeat the Red Queen.

title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
description: A master sorcerer recruits an unlikely apprentice to help him defend Manhattan from dark forces.

title: Oz the Great and Powerful
description: A small-time magician is swept to the Land of Oz where he must become the great wizard they desperately need.

title: Maleficent
description: The untold story of Disney's most iconic villain and her relationship with the princess she cursed.

title: Into the Woods
description: A witch's curse intertwines the lives of fairy tale characters on quests in the dark woods.

title: Cinderella
song: A Dream Is a Wish Your Heart Makes
description: A live-action retelling of the classic tale of a kind-hearted girl who wins the prince's heart with courage.

title: The Jungle Book
description: A man-cub raised by wolves must leave his jungle home when the fearsome tiger Shere Khan returns.

title: Pete's Dragon
description: A mysterious orphan claims to live in the forest with a giant dragon in this reimagining of the classic.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A live-action adaptation where Belle becomes prisoner to a beast and discovers true beauty lies within.

title: Christopher Robin
description: A grown-up Christopher Robin reunites with his childhood friends from the Hundred Acre Wood.

title: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
description: A young girl enters a magical world of four realms where she must restore peace and find her destiny.

title: Mary Poppins Returns
song: The Place Where Lost Things Go
description: Mary Poppins returns to help the now-grown Banks children rediscover joy during difficult times.

title: Dumbo
description: A live-action reimagining of the elephant with oversized ears who becomes a star attraction.

title: Aladdin
description: A street urchin and a princess embark on a magical adventure with the help of a charismatic genie.

title: The Lion King
description: A photorealistic remake of the young lion prince's journey to reclaim his throne and his kingdom.

title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
description: Maleficent and Aurora face new threats as their complex family bonds are tested by war.

title: Mulan
description: A fearless young woman disguises herself as a man to fight in the Imperial Army and save her father.

title: Cruella
description: The origin story of the infamous Cruella de Vil and her rise in 1970s London fashion.

title: Jungle Cruise
description: A riverboat captain and a scientist embark on a perilous Amazon quest to find a mystical healing tree.

title: Disenchanted
description: Giselle wishes for a fairy tale life but accidentally transforms her world into a darker story.

title: Hocus Pocus 2
description: The Sanderson Sisters return to Salem when three high school students accidentally resurrect them.

title: The Little Mermaid
description: A live-action retelling of Ariel's journey from under the sea to discover life on land and find true love.

title: Haunted Mansion
description: A mother and son enlist a diverse team to exorcise the ghosts haunting their New Orleans mansion.
